li.label: blessed by the stars
li.description: I peered into the unknown and saw a maginificent future of incredible possibilities! The world is mine!

li.label: the stars smiled on me
li.description: The stars showed me my future and it was bright.

li.label: the stars ignored me
li.description: Everyone sat there looking at the sky with a smile on their face. All I saw was the sky. Granted, it was beautiful, but...

li.label: the stars scorned me
li.description: The stars showed me my future and it was fraught with peril.

li.label: damned by the stars
li.description: I peered into the unknown and all I saw was pain and misery. Dark days await us.
